name: Searching
description:
A new adventure in a classic style!

Inspired by The Legend of Dragoon, Searching is a turn-based RPG where every attack requires precision timing and practice via Technique Phases!
Hone your skills at the training dummy, or on the monsters!
Unravel the mysterious story. Why does he not speak? What is he searching for?
Become overpowered by conquering every side-quest and finding every chest!
Try to complete all 16 Steam Achievements!

Discord: https://discord.gg/emn5fKqg7H

Discover and master all the Technique Phases!
